Content:: Mariano Martínez (born 20 September 1948 in Burgos) is a French former professional road racing cyclist. He won the King of the Mountains competition in 1978 Tour de France. Although he was born in Spain, he became a naturalized French citizen in 1963.  This biographical article related to a French cycling person born in the 1940s is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
